reviews.review_msg: although organic chem is known for being a tough course for most people (and after expecting to have a "typical" chem prof)... he's far from that. such a charming prof. pretty handsome plus his lectures are very helpful i find. exams are fair and trust me he is just as worth coming to class for as the notes !! ;)

Had him for Chem 281 and 282. He goes through lectures pretty quickly and unless you are at the front of the room, his writing and diagrams can be hard to decipher. The exams are pretty standard in terms of difficulty. He's a pretty nice guy though, so two thumbs up.
